title: Bonus 19: Samson on Trial
itunes:title: Bonus: Samson on Trial
description: We all know of the biblical hero Samson, known to his friends as Shimshon ben Manoah, and to his enemies as “that bastard”. Samson of the long hair, Samson who was seduced by Delilah, Samson who brought down the Philistine temple. In this bonus episode, three award-worthy history podcast writers and producers bring Samson to trial for mass murder.
content:encoded: We all know of the biblical hero Samson, known to his friends as Shimshon ben Manoah, and to his enemies as “that bastard”. Samson of the long hair, Samson who was seduced by Delilah, Samson who brought down the Philistine temple. In this bonus episode, three award-worthy history podcast writers and producers bring Samson to trial for mass murder.
itunes:subtitle: In this bonus episode Steve Guerra of the two podcasts History of the Papacy, and Beyond the Big Screen; Ben Jacobs, of the Wittenberg to Westphalia podcast; and I, put the biblical Samson on trial.
itunes:author: Steve Guerra, Garry Stevens, Ben Jacobs
